namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_flato13ipcc.xml
Description Reproducing selected figures from IPCC AR5, chap. 9 (Flato et al., 2013): Figs. 9.2a/b, 9.4a/b, 9.5, 9,7, 9.10, 9.24a, 9.28, 9.29, 9.30, 9.32, 9.45
Authors Axel Lauer (DLR, Germany - axel.lauer@dlr.de) Veronika Eyring (DLR, Germany - veronika.eyring@dlr.de)
Contributors Irene Cionni, ENEA, namelist_eyring13jgr.xml (Fig. 9.10) Ricard Levine, UK Met Office, namelist_SAMonsoon.xml (Fig. 9.32) Mattia Righi, DLR, namelist_perfmetrics_CMIP5.xml (Fig. 9.7), namelist_aerosol_CMIP5.xml (Figs. 9.28, 9.29) Daniel Senftleben, DLR, namelist_SeaIce.xml (Fig. 9.24) Sabrina Welzel, DLR, namelist_wenzel14jgr.xml (Fig. 9.45)
Projects EMBRACE ESA CCI CMUG ESMVal
Reference Flato, G. et al., Evaluation of climate models, in: Climate Change 2013: the Physical Science Basis, contribution of Working Group I to the Fifth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, edited by: Stocker, T. F., Qin, D., Plattner, G.-K., Tignor, M., Allen, S. K., Boschung, J., Nauels, A., Xia, Y., Bex, V., and Midgley, P. M., Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK and New York, NY, USA (2013)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################

diag.description: multi model mean bias near-surface temperature
multi model mean bias shortwave cloud forcing
multi model mean bias longwave cloud forcing
multi model mean bias net cloud forcing
Set of NH sic timeline, contour and difference plots
Set of SH sic timeline, contour and difference plots
diurnal cycle of precipitation over specific latitude bands
Mean/stddev precip contour plots, seasonal variability, global intensity region plots
preprocess and save co2flux and tas in climo_dir
Wenzel et al. 2014, Fig. 03/04: correlates to variables and saves results to files
Dummy diagnostic to preprocess NBP for carbon_constraint.ncl
Wenzel et al. 2014, Fig. 05: correlates variables and calculates PDF
